signup_intro:
Hey, nice to meet you. Nest gives students free shell accounts and dev tools so you can learn, build, and ship stuff with other hackers. We're a friendly, curious community: teach when someone asks for help, keep work open and collaborative, and be kind to each other.

Below are the important things you need to know before we create your account.

1. Only high-school students can join. We use Hack Club's identity flow to confirm you're a student.
2. What we collect and why. See the Privacy Policy (https://hack.af/nest_privacy) and Your Data on Nest (https://hack.af/nest)
3. Follow the Hack Club Code of Conduct. Treat everyone with respect and kindness, be thoughtful in how you communicate, and don't be destructive or inflammatory. Read more at https://hack.af/conduct
4. Follow Nest's Acceptable Use Policy. It outlines what you can and can't do on Nest. Read more at https://hack.af/nest_aup and https://hack.af/nest_imitations

To start the signup process, type 'signup' or 'register'
username_taken: Username is already taken. Enter a different username
email_registered: Email is already registered. Enter a different email
verification_sent: Verification code sent to your email. Enter the 6-character code
account_created:
Account created! Your temporary password is: {password}
Your account is pending review by admins. You can check back here and see if it's approved.
enter_code_to_delete: Enter the signup code to delete
signup_confirm: To start the signup process, type 'signup' or 'register'
have_signup_code: Do you have a signup code? (Enter code or press Enter to skip)
valid_code: ✅ Valid signup code! Skipping identity verification.
invalid_signup_code: Invalid signup code. Proceeding with identity verification.
already_verified: ✅ You've already verified your student status with Hack Club
pending_review: Your account is pending review. Please check back later.
not_found: Couldn't find that identity. Please visit identity.hackclub.com to submit your information.
needs_submission: You need to submit your identity information on identity.hackclub.com.
pending: Your verification is pending review. Please check back later.
rejected: Your submission was rejected (duplicate identity or bad submission). Please check identity.hackclub.com.
verified_but_over_18: You are verified but not eligible for YSWSes. Please contact the Nest Admins.
